form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service, G-325A ( (REV. 10-1-74)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/17/2023 FORM G-325A (REV. 10-1-74) Y Form Approved UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB No. 43-R436 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE(Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY ALIEN REGISTRATION NO. NEUYEN MINH VAN FEMALE 1915 UN (If A21200457 ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. None FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY Hung OF BIRTH (If Yein known) NVN CITY AND (If any) COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE. FATHER Unknown MOTHER(Maiden name) Unknown HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) WIFE PHAM THI VAC 1913 Hury you NUM 1933 Hiny yen FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES(if none,so state) FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE & PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR 163- 48 Street cholon Saijon UN 65 PRESENT TIME APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST. FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATIONISPECIFYL MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR Budget of foreign Ad office Examinates 73 PRESENT TIME 1420 Hong that Tee Saijon (Retired) " Examinater 65 A21 73 Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE PETITIONER NATURALIZATION ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS OTHER (SPECIFY): REFUGEE IF YOUR LETTERS. WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IN THIS SPACE: the NATIVE ALPHABET OF APPLICANT IN OTHER OR THAN ROMAN DATE 5/8/75 Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT. APPLICANT: BE SURE TO PUT YOUR NAME AND ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN THE BOX OUTLINED BY HEAVY BORDER BELOW. COMPLETE THIS BOX (Family name) (Given name) (Middle name) (Alien registration number) NEUVEN MENH VAN A21 200 457 (OTHER AGENCY USE) INS USE (Office of Origin) OFFICE CODE: TYPE OF CASE: DATE: (2) Rec. Br. FORM G-325A
